mutants.code:
def top_10_rows(matrix):
    rows = []
    for row in matrix:
        row_sum = sum(row)
        num_negatives = sum((1 for num in row if num < 0))
        rows.append((row_sum, num_negatives, row))
    rows.sort(key=lambda x: (-x[0], x[1]))
    return rows[:11]
